venue.name: Villa Victoria's Jorge Hernandez Cultural Center

item.description:
Hey Salsa Fans:

I know this is last second, but I was going to the event anyway and thought any could join me if they would like. I'll be there 30 minute early in case anyone catches the event in time to meet and greet.

I'll be wearing my usual funky grey fedora hat. It's been pretty easy to spot. Hope to see you there.


Salsa for Haiti Fundraiser

Featuring Edwin Pabon and Orchestra .
CincoSon (Salsa Vieja)
Yarina (Ecuadorian music)
I-Level (Reggae/Latin mix)
Carlos de leon y su conjunto

salsa dance performances by bostons best dance companys
also salsa lessons!
Food and Bar

Saturday, January 30, 2010 at 9:00pm

Location: Villa Victoria Center for the Art
Street: 85 West Newton Street Boston ma 02118


Suggested Donation is $10.00 at the door

For more Info. call 617-524-0457 617-927-1722
www.vilavictoriaarts.org www.pabonelsalsero.com

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Salsa for Haiti Fundraiser Featuring Edwin Pabon and Orchestra
